name: Herb And Shallot Salsa
keywords: fresh herbs, lime juice, shallot, side dish, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 cup tightly packed chopped herbs like parsley, cilantro or mint leaves, alone or in any combination
1 small jalapeno or other hot chili (or more to taste), seeded, stemmed and minced
Salt and freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, combine all ingredients and let sit 5 minutes. If mixture seems thick, thin with a little water, neutral oil (like canola or corn oil) or additional lime juice. Taste and adjust seasoning if necessary. Serve with grilled meat, chicken or fish.
